Class Obstacle

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Sprite
      • model.Obstacle

  • public class Obstacle
extends model.Sprite
    Represents obstacles in the game. Extends sprite class for basic features.
    Author:
    Roger

      • Obstacle

        public Obstacle​(model.Coordinate p,
                java.lang.String wordDescriptor)
        Constructor for obstacles. Sets coordinates, sprite image and caption.
        Parameters:
        p - X and Y-coordinates at which the obstacle will be placed.
        wordDescriptor - word to be displayed as obstacle caption.
